text:
MP Xpress is a steel roller coaster at Movie Park Germany. The ride is in "The Old West" section of the park and was previously named "Eraser" (2001–2004) and "FX" (2005).
Ride information.
MP Xpress has a length of 2,260 feet (689 meter), a max speed of 50 miles per hour (80 km/h) and one ride takes 1 minute and 26 seconds. The coaster has 5 inversions, first, a "Roll Over", then a "Sidewinder" and finally a "Double In-Line Twist". MP Xpress rides with 2 trains, each having 10 cars, capable of carrying 2 people. MP Xpress can process 1040 people per hour.
